source.832dc05d:
fig,ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(20,20))
ax = outline_border.plot(ax=ax, edgecolor='red', linewidth=2)
ax.set_title('Border of Bangladesh')
source.b7d20742:
fig,ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(20,20))
ax = divisions.plot(ax=ax , edgecolor='red', linewidth=2)
ax.set_title('Division of Bangladesh with area specification')
source.3719561b:
# different color indicates for different division
fig,ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(20,20))
ax = divisions.plot(ax=ax,cmap='jet' , edgecolor="black", column=division_name,markersize=10)
ax.set_title('Area of Divisions in Bangladesh with different color')
source.1238198d:
fig,ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(20,20))
ax = divisions.plot(ax=ax,cmap='jet' , edgecolor="black", column='ADM1_EN')
divisions.apply(lambda x: ax.annotate(text=x.ADM1_EN, xy=x.geometry.centroid.coords[0], ha='center'), axis=1);
ax.set_title('Name of Divisions in Bangladesh with different color')
